citation.article-title: Deinococcus mumbaiensis Shashidhar and Bandekar 2006 is a later heterotypic synonym of Deinococcus ficus Lai et al. 2006.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of Deinococcus ficus Lai et al. 2006
The characteristics of this species are as described by Lai et al. (2006), with the following amendment.
Results of carbon substrate utilization depend heavily on the method.

With the Biolog method, based on dehydrogenases (Lai et al., 2006), many more utilization tests (e.g. N-acetyl-d-glucosamine, l-arabinose, d-galactose, d-gluconic acid, d-mannitol, d-mannose, melibiose, methyl β-d-glucoside, raffinose, l-rhamnose, d-sorbitol, sucrose, trehalose, d-xylose, β-hydroxybutyric acid, p-hydroxyphenylacetic acid, l-lactic acid, d-malic acid, propionic acid, pyruvic acid, succinic acid and l-asparagine; Lai et al., 2006) are positive than with the growth-based method based on the increase of turbidity (see above).
